message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Hi Bob, I understand that $150 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can sell it to you for $130. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $130 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Hi Bob, I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need to make sure I get a good deal. I can sell it to you for $125. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the product.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Hi Bob, I'm getting a bit closer to your offer, but I still need to make sure I get a good deal. I can sell it to you for $118. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the product.
